name: places/ChIJPR6oDLlYwokRog6VFdrc7E8
adrFormatAddress: 1574 1st Ave., New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text:
I highly recommend anyone who is reading this review to stay away from this locksmith company!!!

I was locked out of my apartment and I called 2 companies (to get a sense of the rates of the market) one of them. I am writing this review about.

I called them up to cancel because they couldn’t provide a COI for my building…

But in the end they showed up anyways  demanding I pay service call… I was tired and fed up with the situation so I let the technician do his work so I could get into my apartment.

A day after the lock broke, and I saw that it was installed incorrectly and in a bad way !!!

So I called up a different company and they were able to show the building a COI - certificate of insurance.

You can see in the second photo that’s how you install this top lock correctly.

Very disappointed. Will not use ever. Stay away if you can.

originalText.text: So relieved I found this place. I called them for a quote to get a door lock replaced and they were fast to answer while also being clear about the quote. They were clear and fast with the scheduling as well, I was told a technician would call me the next day to confirm a time and they did, and arrived promptly. Eli helped me out and was great - he was fast and helpful. He realized my lock was originally installed upside down and kindly fixed it for me. Payment was easy via credit card and the whole thing took under 30 minutes. They will be my go-to for locks and keys.

text.text: So relieved I found this place. I called them for a quote to get a door lock replaced and they were fast to answer while also being clear about the quote. They were clear and fast with the scheduling as well, I was told a technician would call me the next day to confirm a time and they did, and arrived promptly. Eli helped me out and was great - he was fast and helpful. He realized my lock was originally installed upside down and kindly fixed it for me. Payment was easy via credit card and the whole thing took under 30 minutes. They will be my go-to for locks and keys.

originalText.text: Had a great experience here — accidentally got locked out of my safe, and needed help getting it open. Very reasonable price for next-day service considering other places were quoting hundreds of dollars. I also appreciated that they took the time to try to open the safe without destroying it in case it could be saved. Def recommend!

text.text: Had a great experience here — accidentally got locked out of my safe, and needed help getting it open. Very reasonable price for next-day service considering other places were quoting hundreds of dollars. I also appreciated that they took the time to try to open the safe without destroying it in case it could be saved. Def recommend!

originalText.text: Best locksmith in the neighborhood. They take pride in their work and are very diligent to ensure the highest quality. Eli is extremely friendly, professional, and timely. He does a fantastic job, and I continue to hire him for all my building's locksmith needs.

text.text: Best locksmith in the neighborhood. They take pride in their work and are very diligent to ensure the highest quality. Eli is extremely friendly, professional, and timely. He does a fantastic job, and I continue to hire him for all my building's locksmith needs.

originalText.text: I highly highly recommend Sky Locksmith & Safes for all of your locksmith needs. They are communicative, attentive, and very knowledgeable. They also didn't judge me for locking myself out of my apartment twice in two days. Very thankful for the team here.
